paper_abstract: We propose a novel 2D image-based approach that can simultaneously handle illumination and pose variations to enhance face recognition rate. It is much simpler, requires much less computational effort than the methods based on 3D models, and provides a comparable or better recognition rate. (C) 2010 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Face recognition based on 2D images under illumination and pose variations
